name: Escape from house garden
description:
It's time to escape from dangerous house garden! Can you escape?
You are a small creature and you're really scared! You must jump and avoid all adversity! Try to house garden escape in tons of cartoon animations! Run on 18 level and get small amounts of failure!

Game features:
- Beautiful graphics and animations
- Gorgeous gameplay
- Online worldwide leaderboard and achievements
- User friendly & intuitive interface
- Support for mobile and tablet
- Hard difficulty level

Have fun!
